price: (Malaika) akasema: Hakika mimi ni mwenye kutumwa na Mola wako Mlezi ili nikubashirie tunu ya mwana aliye takasika.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَٰمٗا زَكِيّٗا

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā anā rasūlu rabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulāman zakiyyan
